articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Kanggye General Precision Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Kanggye General Precision Machine Plant
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kanggye General Precision Machine Plant.
					He went round the revolutionary museum of the plant.
					
					Watching records of the on-the-spot guidance given by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, he looked back with deep emotion on the shining course of the development of the  plant which was visited by President Kim Il Sung 19 times, by leader Kim Jong Il 17 times and by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk twice.
					
					He learned about the performance of the machines produced by the plant before seeing daily necessities.
					
					At the material processing shop, he learned about the technical specifications and economic efficiency of equipment. He went round the CNC-based automation shop to learn about the modernization of the tools production.
					
					At the assembling and finishing shops he asked about the daily production of machines and underscored the need to provide the workers there with good environment of production.
					
					He set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the plant.
					
					He called on the plant to carry out its monthly and quarterly plans without fail and make good preparations to attain a higher goal of production.
					
					He underlined the need to increase the production efficiency and improve and update equipment.
					
					He called for conducting a brisk drive to improve the quality of products.
					
					The plant should make sure that the workers and technicians get familiar with the trend of development and tendency of the world precision machine industry in good time, he noted.
					
					He told the officials of the plant to pay deep attention to the work for taking good care of the living of the employees.
					
					He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the plant.
					
					He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Thaek Gu, Ryu Yong Sop, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Kim Chun Sop, secretary of the same.

articles.title: Greetings to Grand Duke of Luxemburg
articles.content:
Greetings to Grand Duke of Luxemburg
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to  Henri, grand duke of Luxemburg, on the occasion of its national day.
					The message wished the people of Luxemburg wellbeing and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Luxemburg would steadily grow stronger.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Here Visit Panmunjom
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Here Visit Panmunjom
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Friday visited the truce village of Panmunjom on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					Members of the corps saw the monument inscribed with President Kim Il Sung's signature which conveys the leadership feats he performed in the sacred cause for removing the tragedy of nation's division and reunifying the country.
					
					They went round the conference room where armistice talks took place, the hall where the armistice agreement was signed and Panmun Pavilion, being briefed on the fact that the army and people of the DPRK beat back the invasion by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and won the brilliant victory.
					
					Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy, made an entry in the visitor's book:
					
					Through the visit to Panmunjom I came to know well about the chief culprit of the Korean war.
					
					The Korean people won the brilliant victory in the past Korean War under the wise leadership of the President. This set a model for the world progressive people standing for independence against imperialism.
					
					I hope the army and people of the DPRK will win victory in defending the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving nation under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					Juan Miguel Garcia Montano, military attache of the Cuban embassy, said: The Military Demarcation Line came into existence due to foreign forces. The Korean people have long suffered the tragedy of national division. Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed undying feats in realizing the cause of national reunification.
					
					The military attache of the Vietnamese embassy hoped that the Korean people would achieve success in their efforts to reunify the country.

articles.title: First Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of DPRK Back Home
articles.content:
First Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of DPRK Back Home
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and his party returned home Saturday after visiting China.
					They met with Yang Jiechi, state councilor of China, and Wang Yi, Chinese foreign minister, respectively on June 21.

articles.title: DPRK's Delegations Leave
articles.content:
DPRK's Delegations Leave
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the league, left here Saturday to take part in the second international preparatory meeting for the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students to be held in Spain and the meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth.
					A friendship delegation led by Kim Ung Jin, rector of Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts, left here by train on the same day to visit China.

articles.title: Commendations Awarded to Artistes and Persons of Merit
articles.content:
Commendations Awarded to Artistes and Persons of Merit
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Commendations were awarded to the men's guitar quartet, creators, artistes, officials and staff members of the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces in recognition of their merits.
					They powerfully encouraged the service personnel and people of the DPRK in their drive to devotedly carry out the party's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force by presenting unique and enterprising art performances distinct in political stand and high in the spirit of the times.
					
					The above-said men's guitar quartet was honored to be a merited group. 
					
					The title of Merited Artiste is to go to Han Un Jong and six others, Order of National Flag 1st Class to 3, Order of Labor to one, Order of National Flag 2nd Class to 10, Order of National Flag 3rd Class to 34, Distinguished Military Service Medal to 32 and Medal of Merit to 6.
					
					A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was promulgated on June 19.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Ryongpho Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Ryongpho Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people are visiting the Ryongpho Revolutionary Site in Popdong County, Kangwon Province on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					More than 50,000 service personnel and people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited it this year.
					
					The revolutionary site is a historic place which President Kim Il Sung visited in April, Juche 40 (1951) when the war was in its height, personally unrolled an operational plan for defending the east coastal areas, met with commanding officers and model combatants of the combined unit of the Korean People's Army to encourage them to perform new feats.
					
					There are in the revolutionary site a mountain hut, desk and other historic relics which convey the story that the President drew arrows on the operational map all night by lamp light.

articles.title: Marchers to Revolutionary Sites Tour Puldanggol, Chol Pass
articles.content:
Marchers to Revolutionary Sites Tour Puldanggol, Chol Pass
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The group of service personnel of the Korean People's Army marching to the revolutionary sites in front areas left Chongdu-ri, Kumgang County on June 17. It arrived at the Puldanggol Revolutionary Site associated with the noble footprints of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. They looked round relics with keen interest, being briefed that Kim Il Sung mounted Mt. Jihye, the foremost front, shrouded in artillery smoke on September 23, Juche 40 (1951) to lead the battle on Height 1211 to victory and then called at a farmer's in Puldanggol to show warm loving care and put trust in the owner of the house.
					The marchers laid bouquets before mosaics portraying the kind images of the Generalissimos and paid tribute.
					
					After going round the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army in Kumgang township, they had a meeting with war veterans residing in Hoeyang township and conducted diverse political and cultural activities.
					
					At a meeting to pledge revenge on enemies that was held on June 19, soldiers voiced their resolve to show the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors the real taste of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, the real taste of war.
					
					Soldiers took firing positions and fired at targets with direct hit with thousand-fold revenge on the enemies.
					
					On June 22, the marchers arrived at Chol Pass reflective of the Songun revolutionary leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					They laid bouquets before the Cholryong Monument to Revolutionary Activities of the Generalissimos and looked back on the way to the forefront covered by them despite rain and snow for the country and the people.
					
					A briefing on the greatness of the Generalissimos took place before the monument.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Two kinds of postage stamps have been issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					Printed in the upper parts of the poster-featuring stamps are Korean letters "June 25-July 27" and "Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle", with letters "Arms is the only choice against the enemy!" and "Beat down the U.S. imperialist aggressors!" respectively seen in their lower parts.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Will Get Nothing from Escalating Tensions
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Will Get Nothing from Escalating Tensions
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime should clearly know that no matter how desperately it escalates confrontation with the DPRK, going against the trend for detente and dialogue, this will get it nowhere, warns Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					Its blatant challenge to the DPRK's efforts for dialogue and detente is a treacherous act aimed to realize its wild ambition for confrontation, the article notes, adding:
					
					As it was shown by the talks between the authorities of the north and the south that proved abortive, the south Korean authorities are working hard to lay a hurdle in the way of dialogue and deny it, while groundlessly pulling up the DPRK.
					
					The nation's joint celebrations of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration were not held due to the vicious moves of the puppet group though the preparations progressed amid great expectation and concern at home and abroad.
					
					What the south Korean authorities did after blocking the June 15 events for reunification was the frantic north-targeted war maneuvers in the West Sea of Korea with the approach of the anniversary of the joint declaration.
					
					The south Korean puppet group is slandering the DPRK's proposal for dialogue with the U.S. while talking about "sincerity".
					
					It is seriously mistaken if it thinks the DPRK will change its option under pressure it put in alignment with foreign forces, while pursuing confrontation, not dialogue.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Are to Blame for Failure of Inter-Korean Dialogue: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Are to Blame for Failure of Inter-Korean Dialogue: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Ryu Kil Jae, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, recently made a string of excuses over the abortive talks. He told at the Diplomacy and Unification Committee of the National Assembly that "the south side demanded that the director of the United Front Department of the north be present at the talks" though he was not a man at working-level "as broad agendas were needed to be discussed. He even made such vicious remarks that "the north should take an approach different from that in the past".
					On the same day, members of "the Saenuri Party", too, made ridiculous remarks that "the north is to blame for the abortive talks" and "the north took no sincere approach to the talks".
					
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					This is a disgusting and ridiculous act to divert elsewhere the public criticism of the regime, shift the blame for the abortive talks on to the DPRK and justify the south Korean regime's racket for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					The south Korean regime must be responsible for the abortive talks as it, displeased with the north-south dialogue, invented an ridiculous pretext to prevent the talks from being successfully held.
					
					The DPRK proposed talks between the authorities of the north and the south, a result of its broad magnanimity with which it responded to the offer repeatedly made by the south side.
					
					The DPRK made very possible effort to mend the frayed inter-Korean ties as early as possible and open the road of national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification.
					
					The aim sought by the south Korean regime in persistently seeking to make the talks abortive is to tarnish the image of the DPRK making dynamic efforts for dialogue and detente, maintain the international "sanctions" and pressure on the DPRK and continue pursuing the policy for confrontation with it at any cost.
					
					The south Korean ruling quarters can not deceive the world no matter how desperately they seek to evade the responsibility for the failure of the talks by resorting to such wordplay.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Sycophancy toward U.S. Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Sycophancy toward U.S. Flailed
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- An editor of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on June 17 issued an article chiding the south Korean authorities for their sycophancy toward the U.S.
					The article said that the Park Geun Hye "government" of south Korea are pursuing sycophancy towards the U.S. after making the talks between authorities of the north and the south abortive.
					
					It is not a proper behavior for the present chief executive to pull up the north over its nuclear weapons whenever she talks, it charged.
					
					It is a mockery and hypocrisy to talk about the denuclearization of the north, while keeping mum about the nukes of the U.S. which has threatened the north for such a long period, it noted.
					
					The U.S. keeps nuclear weapons to threaten and invade other countries but those of the DPRK are for protecting peace, it said, adding this is difference between the nukes of the U.S. and the DPRK's nuclear deterrent.
					
					The north is a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and a military power, political and ideological power, cutting-edge scientific and technological power and a space power no one country can provoke, it said, stressing that the U.S. and south Korean authorities should behave themselves.
					
					If the Park Geun Hye "government" continues sticking to the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen and depending on the U.S., it will have no future, the article warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Accused of Covering Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Accused of Covering Crimes
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Ten organizations of south Korea including the Bar Association for Democratic Society, the Teachers Trade Union and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society held a joint press conference on June 18 accusing the puppet prosecution of announcing its investigation results covering the crimes committed by the Intelligence Service.
					The organizations recalled that on June 14 the prosecution announced the results of investigation into the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in politics.
					
					They assailed the authorities for canceling an indictment against staff members of the IS involved in the case and taking no action to punish those policemen concerned who worked hard to cover the crimes of the IS.
					
					However, the authorities indicted a discloser of illegal acts of the IS on the charge of "leakage of secret" and this is just like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" the organizations held.
					
					The prosecution has already confirmed through investigation the crimes of the IS and police's interference with the investigation into them, they said, adding: Intolerable is that the authorities decided not to indict those criminals.
					
					Underlining the need to reveal the whole story about all the illegal acts of the IS, they said, urging the "National Assembly" to opt for making investigation into the state administration.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Publish Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Publish Declaration on Situation
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The General Students Council of Seoul National University of south Korea on June 19 published a declaration on the situation in demand of a thoroughgoing investigation into the puppet Intelligence Service's interference in politics.
					The IS's interference in politics committed in the past "presidential election" was an action of trampling down democracy by illegally abusing power, the declaration charged.
					
					It pressed for a stern punishment of Won Se Hun, former director of the IS, and others responsible for the case.
					
					It condemned the police for downsizing the investigation into the case and patronizing those involved in the case.
					
					The "government" and the "Saenuri Party" should make investigation into the state administration, being held wholly responsible for the case, it said, warning that if they turn down this demand, we will rise up together with all people on this land.
					
					Meanwhile, students of Yonsei University, Korea University, Ehwa Women's University, Sookmyung Women's University, Dongguk University, Duksung Women's University and Kyonggi University published declarations on the situation or expressed their will to join them.

articles.title: General Resignation of S. Korean Puppet Government Demanded
articles.content:
General Resignation of S. Korean Puppet Government Demanded
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The American Regional Huimang Solidarity for People's World made up of 17 organizations of Koreans in the U.S. in a statement on June 16 demanded the general resignation of the present south Korean puppet regime.
					The Koreans experienced the history of bloody seizure of power characterized by the May 16 military coup, the December 12 army purge coup, etc. and again witnessed the present south Korean "government" usurp power as continuation of this history, the statement said.
					
					It expressed irrepressible indignation at the shameless present "government" which infringed upon the right of the people by letting the Intelligence Service and police interfere in the "presidential election" in an organized way for the purpose of seizing power.
					
					It demanded the Park Geun Hye "government" step down en masse, owning responsibility for the IS's illegal interference in the past election.
					
					It urged the south Korean prosecution to make a thoroughgoing investigation into the case of the IS's illegal interference in the election and clarify those forces behind it to the people, though belatedly.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held events in Los Angeles on June 15, the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					There took place the sixth meeting of the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration. Present there were members of the regional committee and delegates of the western, central, New York and Washington regions under the committee.
					
					A report on the activities of the committee over the past one year was made at the meeting. Then, it discussed the orientation of this year's work.
					
					The organization called for marking the anniversaries of the July 4 joint statement, August 15 liberation of Korea and the October 4 declaration this year as national joint events for reunification.
					
					A resolution was read out at the meeting.
					
					It said it has been reconfirmed that to positively implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is the most correct way of improving the bedeviled inter-Korean relations and settling the tense situation.
					
					Whoever loves the nation and desires reunification should devote himself to achieving national co-prosperity in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, it pointed out.
					
					A meeting was held to mark the anniversary of the joint declaration that day.
					
					The historic joint declaration was read out at the meeting and speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					Speakers referred to the historic significance of the adoption of the joint declaration. They called on all Koreans to get united close and open a new phase of national reunification.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 9 posted on its website an article titled "Nuclear weapons are no one's monopoly".
					The DPRK has been exposed to the most persistent and harsh nuclear threat from the U.S. for more than 60 years, the article said, and went on:
					
					Entering the new century the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK has reached an unbearable phase.
					
					The U.S. has escalated the nuclear war maneuvers in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity after putting the DPRK on the "list of preemptive nuclear attack".
					
					The DPRK was compelled to make a final decision in the long run, i.e. to react to U.S. nuclear blackmail with merciless nuclear attack, war of aggression with a grand just war for national reunification!
					
					The army and people of the DPRK have entered an all-out action ready to mount a merciless nuclear strike and blow up the U.S. military bases in south Korea, Japan and U.S. mainland if they mount reckless provocation.
					
					The U.S., which has threatened other countries with nuclear weapons for decades, was made to cry out for the strategy for defending the mainland to cope with nuclear attack on its country.
					
					Gone never to return are the days when the U.S. threatened the DPRK with nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Vladivostok Vit Publishing House of Russia published in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The work, published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies the invincibility of victory of socialism, secret of solidity and invincibility of Korean socialism, essential characters of Korean-style socialism and others.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet of Swiss Organization
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" on its internet homepage on June 16.
					The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it serves as the basic principle to be maintained in the accomplishment of the cause of socialism to preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction. It also indicates the tasks and ways to realize it.

articles.title: Int'l Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Korean People's War Victory Anniversary Formed
articles.content:
Int'l Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Korean People's War Victory Anniversary Formed
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- An international preparatory committee was inaugurated in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia on June 15 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Polish Preparatory Committee Formed
articles.content:
Polish Preparatory Committee Formed
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A Polish preparatory committee was formed in Warsaw on June 17 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					It decided to widely disseminate the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in achieving the victory in the war and the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un during the period from June 25 to July 27. 
					
					It also decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in support of the just cause of the Korean people to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Marked by Organization of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Marked by Organization of Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo on June 13 issued a bulletin to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The bulletin in an article titled "A life devoted to happiness of people" noted:
					
					Since his start of work at the C.C., WPK on June 19, 1964, Kim Jong Il wisely led it, strengthened it into an invincible party and achieved the single-minded unity of whole society.
					
					He developed the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea in the era of independence and embodied it with success by conducting energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					Through his ceaseless field guidance he saw to it that modern factories, new houses and cultural resorts were built in various parts of the country for the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					He, working for the people's happiness despite scorching sunshine and bitter cold, personally entered a pit cutting face with water dripping from its ceiling and walked the rough ridge of paddy fields, providing field guidance till the last moments of his life.
					
					The bulletin in another article titled "Great successor Kim Jong Un" said the dear respected Kim Jong Un has inherited the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven and is pursuing the politics characterized by love for the people.
					
					The future of the DPRK is boundlessly rosy and the Korean people will more dynamically advance under the unfurled banner of socialism as there is Kim Jong Un who regards the people as the most valuable beings.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Organizations of Austria, Brazil
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Organizations of Austria, Brazil
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Austria and Brazil posted on their websites special write-ups to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on June 12 posted an article titled "June 15 North-South Joint Declaration" with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting with Kim Dae Jung, former president of south Korea. The article said:
					
					There took place in 2000 the north-south summit, the first of its kind in history of the Korean nation's division.
					
					Kim Jong Il conducted energetic activities to provide the joint declaration reflecting the basic idea and principle for reunifying the country. As a result, the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration which calls for achieving prosperity common to the nation and reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" was adopted.
					
					No sooner had the declaration been published than it elicited absolute support and sympathy from all the Koreans, and the north and the south dynamically advanced toward reunification.
					
					A dramatic turn has taken place in the Korean nation's cause of reunification in the course of implementing the declaration. It was a fruition of the declaration.
					
					The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on the same day posted an article titled "June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is immortal programme for great national unity and reunification of Korea".
					
					The article said that if the south Korean authorities truly want detente and improved inter-Korean relations, they should take practical measures for respecting and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye.
					Ante todo, el Mariscal estuvo en el museo de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Viendo durante largo tiempo la foto de los Generalisimos colocada en el hall del museo dijo que ellos concedieron gran atencion a esta fabrica que desempena un papel importante en el desarrollo de la industria de construccion de maquinaria de nuestro pais.
					
					Luego de ver la cancion de la fabrica exhibida hizo cantarla al gerente y el secretario del comite del PTC en la fabrica y evaluo que la cancion refleja el espiritu de los obreros de la fabrica y los dos cantaron bien.
					
					Senalo que en su vida el Dirigente Kim Jong Il aprecio y amo especialmente esta fabrica.
					
					La fabrica acondiciono bien el museo de la historia revolucionaria y realiza sustancialmente entre los empleados la educacion en las hazanas de la direccion de los Grandes Hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, senalo y agrego que alli esta preparada bien la base de educacion diametralmente contraria a la otra visitada y criticada hace unos dias.
					
					En la sala de exhibicion de articulos vio las maquinas producidas por la fabrica y se entero de la labor de desarrollo de nuevos productos.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho de que haya desarrollado nuevas y modernas maquinas con las fuerzas y tecnicas domesticas.
					
					Dijo que es bueno el espiritu de trabajar con la fe superando las pruebas dificiles y tomo las medidas necesarias por la modernizacion de la fabrica.
					
					Dando vueltas al taller de elaboracion y el de montaje se cercioro en detalles del estado de la produccion.
					
					Es tan limpio el lugar de trabajo del taller de elaboracion, senalo y vio con alegria varios productos elaborados que salen de las maquinas y prensas modernas.
					
					Luego de ver que los obreros de la fabrica elaboraron y usan en la produccion la moderna maquina de giro, regalo dirigido al Dirigente y al Mariscal, estimo la fidelidad de los obreros al partido.
					
					En el taller de montaje estimulo a los obreros y los tecnicos quienes dedican la inteligencia y esfuerzos a la produccion de maquinas.
					
					Pasando por el recinto de la fabrica evaluo que los obreros hayan acondicionado bien su lugar de trabajo y agrego que deben desplegar con mas dinamismo la labor para convertir el interior y exterior de la fabrica en el paraiso y el parque.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio la piscina y el gimnasio construidos nuevamente por la fabrica.
					
					Evaluo a los funcionarios de la fabrica y del sector correspondiente quienes se esforzaron abnegadamente por ofrecer a los obreros las suficientes condiciones culturales y de descanso.
					
					Es muy alegre ver la piscina y el gimnasio acondicionados magnificamente, dijo y apunto que esta fabrica es muy agradable de ver.
					
					En el comedor y el taller de elaboracion de soya se entero del estado de la labor de intendencia.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho al informarse de que la fabrica realiza las actividades de servicio estableciendo detalladamente el plan para el servicio diario, el especial de mes, el de parejas innovadoras, el de dia de madre y el de cumpleanos.
					
					Destacando otra vez que la labor de intendencia es el combate de defensa del socialismo, enseno que los funcionarios deben prestar primordial atencion al mejoramiento de la vida material y cultural de los obreros y senalo que es muy alegre cuando visita la fabrica que hace bien la labor de intendencia.
					
					Se encontro con los innovadores de la fabrica y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Tras ver el gran coro de los obreros de la fabrica "Nuestra fabrica brilla con el linaje del monte Paektu", felicito el exito de la funcion.
					
					Enfatizo que al ver la funcion llego a tener la decision de hacer bien en el futuro la revolucion junto con nuestros dignos obreros.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Thaek Gu y el secretario responsable del comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang Ryu Yong Sop.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al gran duque de Luxemburgo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al gran duque de Luxemburgo
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de felicitacion al gran duque de Luxemburgo, Henri, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais. 
					El remitente desea bienestar y prosperidad al pueblo de Luxemburgo y expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran constantemente.

articles.title: Autoridades surcoreanas tienen responsabilidad de fracaso de dialogo N-S, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Autoridades surcoreanas tienen responsabilidad de fracaso de dialogo N-S, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, el ministro titere de Unificacion del Sur de Corea Ryu Kil Jae dijo en el Comite de Unificacion y Diplomacia de la "Asamblea Nacional" que para debatir muchos temas demando al Norte de Corea hacer las conversaciones no a nivel de expertos sino con el jefe del Departamento del Frente Unido y agrego que el Norte lo nego, razon por la cual presento al viceministro de Unificacion como delegado-jefe. Y subrayo que el Norte debe tomar la posicion diferente a la pasada.
					El mismo dia, los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" hablaron que el autor del fracaso de las conversaciones es el Norte que no tiene sinceridad al respecto.
					
					Es una actitud grosera para evadir la denuncia del interior y exterior dirigida a si misma, imputar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la responsabilidad del fracaso de las conversaciones N-S y justificar la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC.
					
					Asi critica el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual insertado este sabado y continua:
					
					La responsabilidad de la quiebra del dialogo N-S en visperas de apertura recae enteramente en la banda de titeres que no tiene interes en ello y puso obstaculos ante la apertura de conversaciones con el pretexto absurdo.
					
					Las conversaciones N-S estaban previstas por la generosidad de la RPDC que acepto la reiterada solicitud del Sur por el respecto.
					
					Hasta la hecha, la RPDC ha hecho todos sus esfuerzos por mejorar cuanto antes las catastroficas relaciones intercoreanas y reabrir el camino de la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion y la paz y reunificacion.
					
					La camarilla titere persigue solo el objetivo de manchar la imagen de la RPDC que se esfuerza por el dialogo y el alivio de tension, mantener el ambiente de "sancion" y presion internacionales contra la RPDC y realizar a toda costa su politica conflictiva.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no podran enganar a la opinion publica interna y externa, aunque se desesperen con disparates ilogicos para evitar la responsabilidad del fracaso del dialogo N-S.
